name: The North Face Heritage Patch Crew - Men's
description:
A modernized version of a classic style in a warm mid-weight fabric. Just right for shoulder-seasons days where a tee won’t cut it and a jacket is overkill.Made of durable polyester blended with soft cotton.Heavier-weight ribbed collar and cuffs.Standard fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
